        <description/>
        <name>BaseSMControls</name>
        <script><![CDATA[var BaseSMControls = Class.create();
BaseSMControls.prototype = {
    initialize: function() {
    },
	
	allowConfigRead: function(config) {
		return this._allowConfigRead(config);
	},
	
	allowNotificationRuleRelatedListCreate: function(upgradeInfo) {
		return this._allowNotificationRuleRelatedListCreate(upgradeInfo);
	},
	
	_allowConfigRead: function(config) {
		if (!config)
			return false;
		
		var appName = config.app_name + '';
		switch(appName) {
			default:
				return new sn_sm.SMConfiguration().hasRole(current, 'basic') || gs.hasRole('admin');	
		}	
	},
	
	_allowNotificationRuleRelatedListCreate: function(upgradeInfo) {
		var uri = gs.action.getGlideURI();
		var uriStr = uri + '';
		if (uriStr.indexOf('sm_config') == 0) {
			var configId = uri.get('sys_id') + '';
			var config = new GlideRecord('sm_config');
			if (!config.get(configId)) {
				var query = uri.get('sysparm_query');
				var parts = query.split('&');
				var appName = null;
				for(var i = 0; i < parts.length; i++) {
					var queryPart = parts[i];
					var colVal = queryPart.split('=');
					if (colVal.length >= 2) {
						if (colVal[0] == 'app_name')
							appName = colVal[1];
					}
				}
				if (appName == null)
					return false;
				
				config = new GlideRecord('sm_config');
				if (!config.get('app_name', appName))
					return false;
			}
			
			var updatesNeeded = 
				(new SMApplicationUpdateHelper().checkIfNotificationNeedsUpdate(config.user_created, upgradeInfo));
			
			if (gs.hasRole('admin'))
				return !updatesNeeded && config.isInSelectedScope();
			
			return !updatesNeeded && new sn_sm.SMConfiguration().hasRole(config, 'admin');
		}
		return true;
	},

    type: 'BaseSMControls'
};]]></script>
